basics.name: Junle Yan
basics.label: Student
basics.summary: I am studying for a B.S. in Computer Science in the Department of Information and Computer Sciences at the University of Hawaii at Manoa. I expect to graduate in Spring, 2027.

education.institution: University of Hawaii at Manoa, Honolulu, HI

work.summary: Maintained and contributed to the development of STAR GPS, an easy-to-navigate course registration system for undergraduate and graduate courses at the University of Hawai ªi, utilized by over 18,000 students to facilitate timely graduation
highlights: Improved UI/UX, resulting in a significant decrease in user help center inquiries
Conducted security vulnerability assessments on SQL procedures and API endpoints
Performed software maintenances across the codebase

work.company: International Structural Engineering and Construction Society
work.summary: Led the development of a LAMP-based web application to streamline the submission and review process for academic research, successfully handling over 80+ papers from 23 countries

awards.title: Provost Achievement Scholarship
awards.summary: Merit scholarship for outstanding academic achievements, creative pursuits, and a strong track record of participation in academic, co-curricular, and community service activities.
